attributes.action: Stop the mass construction of houses now to protect our wildlife and nature
attributes.additional_details:
Construction contributes to climate change, landfill waste, air & water pollution, & noise pollution. Where we should be doing everything in our power not to contribute excessively to climate change - we are without hesitation. Land clearing for construction projects leads to the loss of natural habitats & ecosystems. 
The extraction of materials like sand & gravel can also damage landscapes and ecosystems. 
Construction noise and traffic can disrupt wildlife and negatively impact biodiversity.
attributes.background: Stop the mass construction that’s destroying our natural environment and wildlife.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by mass construction, and what you are referring to when you call for the Government or Parliament to stop mass construction.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do in relation to stopping construction.
